articles.content: Ace investor Ashish Kacholia-backed smallcap firm, Zaggle Prepaid Ocean Services shares jumped nearly 8% to Rs 338 in Friday's trade on BSE after the company posted robust Q4 results.The SaaS fintech… [+2853 chars]

articles.author: Dhanya Nagasundaram
articles.title: GSM Foils IPO fully booked within hours of opening, retail investors steal the show; know GMP, subscription status, more | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: GSM Foils IPO subscriptions began on May 24 and will end on May 28 at a price band of  ₹32 per share. The company produces Blister Foils and Aluminium Pharma Foils for pharmaceutical packaging. Promoters are Mohansingh L. Parmar and Sagar Girish Bhanushali.
articles.content: GSM Foils IPO has began subscriptions on Friday, May 24, and will end on Tuesday, May 28. GSM Foils IPO price band has been set at 32 per equity share with a face value of 10 each. The lot size for t… [+3286 chars]

articles.author: Pranati Deva
articles.title: ITC Q4 results review: Should you buy, sell or hold the FMCG major? Here's what 5 top brokerages say | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: ITC reported a 1.3 percent YoY decline in its standalone net profit to  ₹5,020.20 crore for the quarter ending March 2024, slightly below the  ₹5,150 crore estimated by analysts in a Bloomberg poll.
articles.content: ITC Ltd.'s March quarter results were a mixed bag, but analysts at several brokerage firms continued to rate its stock as a 'buy,' citing stability in its cigarette business. Brokerages have set pric… [+5069 chars]

articles.title: Inox Wind shares surge 8% after stock trades ex-bonus, turns positive for May - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Inox Wind shares have risen over 400% in the last 12 months.
